item.title: Our Vision and Mission
item.description:
OpenPlantPathology (OPP) fosters a culture that values open, transparent and reproducible research using shared data and reusable software. We do this by: Creating social infrastructure through a welcoming, engaged and diverse community in a Slack chatting workspace and on Twitter. How to join and what to do? (click on the image to send email)
Creating technical infrastructure by selecting well-recognised leaders from computational plant pathology to help direct and engage the community, and create community-contributed web-based (website and GitHub) open source software tools that provide scientific data sources and instructional materials for self-instruction or classroom settings.
